Author: Harooooo1
Description: Improves tooltips of all units, techs and buildings. Adds detailed info such as attack bonuses, armor classes, move speed, reload time, attack delay, creation/research time, special abilities, accuracy, blast radius. Techs/upgrades show exactly which stats are changed. Improved civilisation description. Removed most useless tooltips that appear on mouse over. Restart game after subscribing. Tooltips always appear in tech tree, and ingame if
is on.Now supports the Aoe1 DLC Return of Rome as well.
Title: Improved Extended Tooltips
